text: Charlie Barrett (age 40) is an American professional rock climber. == Early life and Professional career == Barrett grew up in Santa Rosa,Charlie Barrett moved to the Mammoth area more than thirteen years ago. He is a native of Sonoma County. According to a 2019 Tahoe Quarterly article, Barrett, who was originally from Santa Rosa, was a well-known climber in California and built "some of the hardest bouldering routes" in the region. Bouldering is a form of rock climbing that doesn't require ropes. He made his home in South Lake Tahoe, Mammoth Lakes, and Bishop, three hotspots for rock climbing. == Controversies == In 2024, he was found guilty of three counts of a 2016 sexual assault against a woman who was visiting Yosemite National Park, and he was given a life sentenceand a fine of $250,000. == References == Category:Rock climbing Category:American sex offenders Category:Criminals from California Category:Living people
title: Charlie Barrett
